The protocol update proposal was initiated 45 mins ago. This is by definition creating a fork on the ITN network with 0.8.x vs 0.9.x nodes.   If you want to participate to the vote to extend the rewards pot, you need to upgrade to 0.9.x and you'll join the right fork🖖  #Cardano
